import React from "react"; import { Link, Redirect, Route } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../common/Header"; import Footer from "../common/Footer"; import ScriptTag from "react-script-tag"; import AOS from "aos"; const Register = ({ history, registerUser = (f) => f }) => { let _fname, _lname, _email, _phone, _password; let ref_url_raw = window.location.href; let ref_url = localStorage["refState"] ? JSON.parse(localStorage["refState"]).refURL : ""; // console.log(ref_url); // save ref_url state in local storage let refState = { refURL: ref_url_raw, }; localStorage["refState"] = JSON.stringify(refState); const handleRegistration = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); registerUser( _fname.value, _lname.value, _email.value, _phone.value, _password.value, ref_url ); }; const isLoggedIn = localStorage["appState"] ? JSON.parse(localStorage["appState"]).isLoggedIn : ""; return isLoggedIn ? ( ) : (
